scripts.test: cd packages/client && yarn test --watchAll=false && cd ../common && yarn test && cd ../server && yarn test
scripts.lint: ESLINTOPTS='--ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings=0'; cd packages/client && eslint ${ESLINTOPTS} ./src && cd ../server && eslint ${ESLINTOPTS} ./src ./scripts && cd ../common && eslint ${ESLINTOPTS} ./src
scripts.ci-build: yarn lint && yarn test && cd packages/server && yarn deploy && yarn extractStackOutputs && cd ../client && yarn full-build
